title: Agent Skills for Cascade (v1.13.6)
description: Windsurf v1.13.6 released with Agent Skills support for Cascade, enabling enhanced agentic capabilities. Includes various bug fixes, performance improvements, and enhanced stability and reliability.

title: Workflow Bug Fixes (v1.39.0)
description: Continue v1.39.0 released with critical bug fixes including GH_TOKEN addition to continue-agents workflow (fixing issue #9493) and resolving circular dependency by extracting tool names.

title: API v3 Session Tags and Enterprise Features
description: Devin released multiple API v3 updates in January 2026 including Session Tags router, Enterprise Sessions endpoint, Git Permissions updates with prefix_path support, session impersonation capabilities, and Notes/Playbooks management endpoints. Application updates include custom slash commands for organizations, Microsoft Teams integration, and Dana (Data Analyst Devin) availability.

title: Version 2.1 Release - Major Update
description: Claude Code 2.1 released with 1096 commits and 16 major new features including one of the most-requested user features. Updated UX touches, platform support, image source metadata, clickable paths, and winget install support added.

community_feedback.quote: Claude Code just got updated with one of the most-requested user features

title: Enhanced Agents, Context Management, and New Installation Methods
description: GitHub Copilot CLI introduced specialized custom agents (Explore, Task, Plan, Code-review), new context management commands (/usage, /compact, /context), and multiple installation methods including WinGet, Homebrew, and install scripts with auto-update support.

community_feedback.quote: Copilot now remembers what it learns across your workflow. Copilot coding agent, CLI, and code review share knowledge automatically
Used a ton of feedback from around GitHub Universe to improve the agents experience in @code. Keep the feedback coming!

title: BYOK (Bring Your Own Key) Enhancements
description: GitHub Copilot added enhanced BYOK functionality with additional API support, new configuration options, and more provider integrations for enterprise customers.

title: CLI Features and MCP Management
description: Cursor released new CLI controls for models, MCP (Model Context Protocol) management tools, and improved CLI performance. Hooks performance improved by 10-20x.

title: GPT-5.2-Codex Default Model Update
description: Codex CLI versions 0.81.0 through 0.85.0 switched the default API model to gpt-5.2-codex, with improvements for long-horizon context, big refactors, and Windows performance.

community_feedback.quote: Seems like a nice 10% lift in coding capability. I'm running it on xhigh as I was GPT 5.2. It's stable, predictable, reliable, smart, methodical...
It was only a few weeks ago when I was grateful for Codex 5.1 Extra high, but I'm ever more grateful for the new 5.2 Extra High!

title: Agent Skills Support and Conductor Extension
description: Gemini CLI added Agent Skills support and introduced the Conductor extension to address context loss issues in AI-assisted development. Includes one-click Claude Code feature migration.
